TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed DateTimeSerializationSection/DateTimeSerializationMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 判斷 物件的 XML 序列化格式。

span.span: Determines XML serialization format of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別由序列化基礎結構，並不提供公用用途。This enumeration is used by the serialization infrastructure only, and is not intended for public use. 若要實際設定序列化模式，建立應用程式組態檔，並設定[ <dateTimeSerialization>元素](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md)進行適當的設定。To actually set the serialization mode, create an application configuration file, and set the [<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) to an appropriate setting. 如需組態檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[組態檔結構描述](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md)。For more information about configuration files, see [Configuration File Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md). 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET Framework，以及在版本 2.0 和更新版本，當這個屬性設定為在`Local`，物件一律會格式化為本地時間。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of .NET Framework, as well as in versions 2.0 and later when this property is set to `Local`, objects are always formatted as the local time. 也就是說，本地時區資訊一定會包含在序列化資料中。That is, local time zone information is always included with the serialized data. 將此屬性設定為`Local`以確保相容性與舊版本的.Net Framework。Set this property to `Local` to ensure compatibility with older versions of the .Net Framework. 在版本 2.0 和更新版本的.NET Framework 中，此屬性設定為`Roundtrip`物件會檢查以判斷它們是否位於本機，UTC 或未指定的時區，並以序列化此資訊的方式保留。In versions 2.0 and later of the .NET Framework, with this property set to `Roundtrip` objects are examined to determine whether they are in the local, UTC or an unspecified time zone, and are serialized in such a way that this information is preserved. 這是預設行為，而且建議所有新的應用程式不會與舊版本的架構和通訊。This is the default behavior and is recommended for all new applications that do not communicate with older versions of the framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection/DateTimeSerializationMode Default = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection/DateTimeSerializationMode Local = int32(2)

summary.span: 序列化程式會將所有 物件格式化為本地時間。

span.span: The serializer formats all objects as local time.

summary.span: 這適用於版本 1.0 和 1.1 的相容性。

span.span: This is for version 1.0 and 1.1 compatibility.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection/DateTimeSerializationMode Roundtrip = int32(1)

summary.span: 序列化程式會檢查個別的 執行個體，以判斷序列化格式︰UTC、本機或未指定。

span.span: The serializer examines individual instances to determine the serialization format: UTC, local, or unspecified.
